Geographic origin: Chico, Butte County, California, United States
Notes on original: S.P.L. No. 13842; Cross section too soft to paint. However, there seems to be no appreciable varietal difference between this variety and S.P.L. 13846 [Shalemin?] Which is correctly named is uncertain at this time; 12/04/1925; HPG
Name: Diospyros: Atago
